title: #242 Class President Moment w/ Aria Thomé
itunes:title: #242 Class President Moment w/ Aria Thomé
description:
Nikki invited her vocal instructor/sound healer Aria Thomé  (cast of E!'s Welcome Home Nikki Glaser?) to join the pod. She shares her background and answers all the questions Nikki and Andrew have about being a trans woman and her journey to finding peace within. To learn more about Aria's sound healing services and vocal coaching, please visit her website: ariasound108.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
